description: This creamy butter chicken pie is ready to serve in 20 minutes. It's an impressive dish that's as easy as pie to make.
name: 20-Minute Butter Chicken Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg fresh skinless chicken thigh fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer butter chicken into hot baking dish from the oven and top with puff pastry round. Serve immediately.
